org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer

Class TcpBuilder<T,S extends TcpBuilder<T,S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer.Builder<T,S>
      • org.openmuc.jmbus.transportlayer.TcpBuilder<T,S>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MBusConnection.MBusTcpBuilder, WMBusConnection.WMBusTcpBuilder

    public abstract class TcpBuilder<T,S extends TcpBuilder<T,S>>
extends Builder<T,S>
    Connection builder for TCP connections.
    M-Bus over TCP has the same data like M-Bus over Serial connection, only the transport layer and below differs.

      Constructor of the TCP/IP Settings Builder, for connecting M-Bus devices over TCP/IP.
